105  void send_from_queue(const std::shared_ptr<Connection> &connection) {
106  strand.post([this, connection]() {
107  asio::async_write(*socket, send_queue.begin()->header_stream->streambuf,
108  strand.wrap([this, connection](const error_code& ec, size_t /*bytes_transferred*/) {
109  if(!ec) {
110  asio::async_write(*socket, send_queue.begin()->message_stream->streambuf,
111  strand.wrap([this, connection]
112  (const error_code& ec, size_t /*bytes_transferred*/) {
113  auto send_queued=send_queue.begin();
114  if(send_queued->callback)
115  send_queued->callback(ec);
116  if(!ec) {
117  send_queue.erase(send_queued);
118  if(send_queue.size()>0)
119  send_from_queue(connection);
120  }
121  else
122  send_queue.clear();
123  }));
124  }
125  else {
126  auto send_queued=send_queue.begin();
127  if(send_queued->callback)
128  send_queued->callback(ec);
129  send_queue.clear();
130  }
131  }));
132  });
133  }

139  void read_remote_endpoint_data() {
140  try {
141  remote_endpoint_address=socket->lowest_layer().remote_endpoint().address().to_string();
142  remote_endpoint_port=socket->lowest_layer().remote_endpoint().port();
143  }
144  catch(...) {}
145  }
146  };

190  class Config {
191  friend class SocketServerBase<socket_type>;
192  private:
193  Config(unsigned short port): port(port) {}
194  public:
196  unsigned short port;
198  size_t thread_pool_size=1;
200  size_t timeout_request=5;
202  size_t timeout_idle=0;
205  std::string address;
207  bool reuse_address=true;
208  };
210  Config config;
211 
212  private:
213  class regex_orderable : public regex::regex {
214  std::string str;
215  public:
216  regex_orderable(const char *regex_cstr) : regex::regex(regex_cstr), str(regex_cstr) {}
217  regex_orderable(const std::string &regex_str) : regex::regex(regex_str), str(regex_str) {}
218  bool operator<(const regex_orderable &rhs) const {
219  return str<rhs.str;
220  }
221  };
222  public:
224  std::map<regex_orderable, Endpoint> endpoint;
225 
226  virtual void start() {
227  for(auto &endp: endpoint) {
228  // TODO: remove when onopen, onmessage, etc is removed:
229  if(endp.second.onopen)
230  endp.second.on_open=endp.second.onopen;
231  if(endp.second.onmessage)
232  endp.second.on_message=endp.second.onmessage;
233  if(endp.second.onclose)
234  endp.second.on_close=endp.second.onclose;
235  if(endp.second.onerror)
236  endp.second.on_error=endp.second.onerror;
237  }
238 
239  if(!io_service)
240  io_service=std::make_shared<asio::io_service>();
241 
242  if(io_service->stopped())
243  io_service->reset();
244 
245  asio::ip::tcp::endpoint endpoint;
246  if(config.address.size()>0)
247  endpoint=asio::ip::tcp::endpoint(asio::ip::address::from_string(config.address), config.port);
248  else
249  endpoint=asio::ip::tcp::endpoint(asio::ip::tcp::v4(), config.port);
250 
251  if(!acceptor)
252  acceptor=std::unique_ptr<asio::ip::tcp::acceptor>(new asio::ip::tcp::acceptor(*io_service));
253  acceptor->open(endpoint.protocol());
254  acceptor->set_option(asio::socket_base::reuse_address(config.reuse_address));
255  acceptor->bind(endpoint);
256  acceptor->listen();
257 
258  accept();
259 
260  //If thread_pool_size>1, start m_io_service.run() in (thread_pool_size-1) threads for thread-pooling
261  threads.clear();
262  for(size_t c=1;c<config.thread_pool_size;c++) {
263  threads.emplace_back([this](){
264  io_service->run();
265  });
266  }
267  //Main thread
268  if(config.thread_pool_size>0)
269  io_service->run();
270 
271  //Wait for the rest of the threads, if any, to finish as well
272  for(auto& t: threads) {
273  t.join();
274  }
275  }
276 
277  void stop() {
278  acceptor->close();
279  if(config.thread_pool_size>0)
280  io_service->stop();
281 
282  for(auto &pair: endpoint) {
283  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(pair.second.connections_mutex);
284  for(auto &connection: pair.second.connections) {
285  connection->socket->lowest_layer().shutdown(asio::ip::tcp::socket::shutdown_both);
286  connection->socket->lowest_layer().close();
287  }
288  pair.second.connections.clear();
289  }
290  }
291 
294  void send(const std::shared_ptr<Connection> &connection, const std::shared_ptr<SendStream> &message_stream,
295  const std::function<void(const error_code&)>& callback=nullptr,
296  unsigned char fin_rsv_opcode=129) const {
297  if(fin_rsv_opcode!=136)
298  timer_idle_reset(connection);
299 
300  auto header_stream=std::make_shared<SendStream>();
301 
302  size_t length=message_stream->size();
303 
304  header_stream->put(fin_rsv_opcode);
305  //unmasked (first length byte<128)
306  if(length>=126) {
307  int num_bytes;
308  if(length>0xffff) {
309  num_bytes=8;
310  header_stream->put(127);
311  }
312  else {
313  num_bytes=2;
314  header_stream->put(126);
315  }
316 
317  for(int c=num_bytes-1;c>=0;c--) {
318  header_stream->put((static_cast<unsigned long long>(length) >> (8 * c)) % 256);
319  }
320  }
321  else
322  header_stream->put(static_cast<unsigned char>(length));
323 
324  connection->strand.post([this, connection, header_stream, message_stream, callback]() {
325  connection->send_queue.emplace_back(header_stream, message_stream, callback);
326  if(connection->send_queue.size()==1)
327  connection->send_from_queue(connection);
328  });
329  }
330 
331  void send_close(const std::shared_ptr<Connection> &connection, int status, const std::string& reason="",
332  const std::function<void(const error_code&)>& callback=nullptr) const {
333  //Send close only once (in case close is initiated by server)
334  if(connection->closed)
335  return;
336  connection->closed=true;
337 
338  auto send_stream=std::make_shared<SendStream>();
339 
340  send_stream->put(status>>8);
341  send_stream->put(status%256);
342 
343  *send_stream << reason;
344 
345  //fin_rsv_opcode=136: message close
346  send(connection, send_stream, callback, 136);
347  }
348 
349  std::unordered_set<std::shared_ptr<Connection> > get_connections() {
350  std::unordered_set<std::shared_ptr<Connection> > all_connections;
351  for(auto& e: endpoint) {
352  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(e.second.connections_mutex);
353  all_connections.insert(e.second.connections.begin(), e.second.connections.end());
354  }
355  return all_connections;
356  }

376  void upgrade(const std::shared_ptr<Connection> &connection) {
377  auto read_buffer=std::make_shared<asio::streambuf>();
378  write_handshake(connection, read_buffer);
379  }

383  std::shared_ptr<asio::io_service> io_service;
384  protected:
385  const std::string ws_magic_string="258EAFA5-E914-47DA-95CA-C5AB0DC85B11";
386 
387  std::unique_ptr<asio::ip::tcp::acceptor> acceptor;

391  SocketServerBase(unsigned short port) : config(port) {}

395  std::shared_ptr<asio::deadline_timer> get_timeout_timer(const std::shared_ptr<Connection> &connection, size_t seconds) {
396  if(seconds==0)
397  return nullptr;
398 
399  auto timer=std::make_shared<asio::deadline_timer>(connection->socket->get_io_service());
400  timer->expires_from_now(boost::posix_time::seconds(static_cast<long>(seconds)));
401  timer->async_wait([connection](const error_code& ec){
402  if(!ec) {
403  connection->socket->lowest_layer().shutdown(asio::ip::tcp::socket::shutdown_both);
404  connection->socket->lowest_layer().close();
405  }
406  });
407  return timer;
408  }
409 
410  void read_handshake(const std::shared_ptr<Connection> &connection) {
411  connection->read_remote_endpoint_data();
412 
413  //Create new read_buffer for async_read_until()
414  //Shared_ptr is used to pass temporary objects to the asynchronous functions
415  auto read_buffer=std::make_shared<asio::streambuf>();
416 
417  //Set timeout on the following asio::async-read or write function
418  auto timer=get_timeout_timer(connection, config.timeout_request);
419 
420  asio::async_read_until(*connection->socket, *read_buffer, "\r\n\r\n",
421  [this, connection, read_buffer, timer]
422  (const error_code& ec, size_t /*bytes_transferred*/) {
423  if(timer)
424  timer->cancel();
425  if(!ec) {
426  //Convert to istream to extract string-lines
427  std::istream stream(read_buffer.get());
428 
429  parse_handshake(connection, stream);
430 
431  write_handshake(connection, read_buffer);
432  }
433  });
434  }
435 
436  void parse_handshake(const std::shared_ptr<Connection> &connection, std::istream& stream) const {
437  std::string line;
438  getline(stream, line);
439  size_t method_end;
440  if((method_end=line.find(' '))!=std::string::npos) {
441  size_t path_end;
442  if((path_end=line.find(' ', method_end+1))!=std::string::npos) {
443  connection->method=line.substr(0, method_end);
444  connection->path=line.substr(method_end+1, path_end-method_end-1);
445  if((path_end+6)<line.size())
446  connection->http_version=line.substr(path_end+6, line.size()-(path_end+6)-1);
447  else
448  connection->http_version="1.1";
449 
450  getline(stream, line);
451  size_t param_end;
452  while((param_end=line.find(':'))!=std::string::npos) {
453  size_t value_start=param_end+1;
454  if((value_start)<line.size()) {
455  if(line[value_start]==' ')
456  value_start++;
457  if(value_start<line.size())
458  connection->header.emplace(line.substr(0, param_end), line.substr(value_start, line.size()-value_start-1));
459  }
460 
461  getline(stream, line);
462  }
463  }
464  }
465  }
466 
467  void write_handshake(const std::shared_ptr<Connection> &connection, const std::shared_ptr<asio::streambuf> &read_buffer) {
468  //Find path- and method-match, and generate response
469  for(auto &regex_endpoint: endpoint) {
470  regex::smatch path_match;
471  if(regex::regex_match(connection->path, path_match, regex_endpoint.first)) {
472  auto write_buffer=std::make_shared<asio::streambuf>();
473  std::ostream handshake(write_buffer.get());
474 
475  if(generate_handshake(connection, handshake)) {
476  connection->path_match=std::move(path_match);
477  //Capture write_buffer in lambda so it is not destroyed before async_write is finished
478  asio::async_write(*connection->socket, *write_buffer,
479  [this, connection, write_buffer, read_buffer, &regex_endpoint]
480  (const error_code& ec, size_t /*bytes_transferred*/) {
481  if(!ec) {
482  connection_open(connection, regex_endpoint.second);
483  read_message(connection, read_buffer, regex_endpoint.second);
484  }
485  else
486  connection_error(connection, regex_endpoint.second, ec);
487  });
488  }
489  return;
490  }
491  }
492  }
493 
494  bool generate_handshake(const std::shared_ptr<Connection> &connection, std::ostream& handshake) const {
495  auto header_it=connection->header.find("Sec-WebSocket-Key");
496  if(header_it==connection->header.end())
497  return false;
498 
499  auto sha1=Crypto::sha1(header_it->second+ws_magic_string);
500 
501  handshake << "HTTP/1.1 101 Web Socket Protocol Handshake\r\n";
502  handshake << "Upgrade: websocket\r\n";
503  handshake << "Connection: Upgrade\r\n";
504  handshake << "Sec-WebSocket-Accept: " << Crypto::Base64::encode(sha1) << "\r\n";
505  handshake << "\r\n";
506 
507  return true;
508  }
509 
510  void read_message(const std::shared_ptr<Connection> &connection,
511  const std::shared_ptr<asio::streambuf> &read_buffer, Endpoint& endpoint) const {
512  asio::async_read(*connection->socket, *read_buffer, asio::transfer_exactly(2),
513  [this, connection, read_buffer, &endpoint]
514  (const error_code& ec, size_t bytes_transferred) {
515  if(!ec) {
516  if(bytes_transferred==0) { //TODO: why does this happen sometimes?
517  read_message(connection, read_buffer, endpoint);
518  return;
519  }
520  std::istream stream(read_buffer.get());
521 
522  std::vector<unsigned char> first_bytes;
523  first_bytes.resize(2);
524  stream.read((char*)&first_bytes[0], 2);
525 
526  unsigned char fin_rsv_opcode=first_bytes[0];
527 
528  //Close connection if unmasked message from client (protocol error)
529  if(first_bytes[1]<128) {
530  const std::string reason("message from client not masked");
531  send_close(connection, 1002, reason, [this, connection](const error_code& /*ec*/) {});
532  connection_close(connection, endpoint, 1002, reason);
533  return;
534  }
535 
536  size_t length=(first_bytes[1]&127);
537 
538  if(length==126) {
539  //2 next bytes is the size of content
540  asio::async_read(*connection->socket, *read_buffer, asio::transfer_exactly(2),
541  [this, connection, read_buffer, &endpoint, fin_rsv_opcode]
542  (const error_code& ec, size_t /*bytes_transferred*/) {
543  if(!ec) {
544  std::istream stream(read_buffer.get());
545 
546  std::vector<unsigned char> length_bytes;
547  length_bytes.resize(2);
548  stream.read((char*)&length_bytes[0], 2);
549 
550  size_t length=0;
551  int num_bytes=2;
552  for(int c=0;c<num_bytes;c++)
553  length+=length_bytes[c]<<(8*(num_bytes-1-c));
554 
555  read_message_content(connection, read_buffer, length, endpoint, fin_rsv_opcode);
556  }
557  else
558  connection_error(connection, endpoint, ec);
559  });
560  }
561  else if(length==127) {
562  //8 next bytes is the size of content
563  asio::async_read(*connection->socket, *read_buffer, asio::transfer_exactly(8),
564  [this, connection, read_buffer, &endpoint, fin_rsv_opcode]
565  (const error_code& ec, size_t /*bytes_transferred*/) {
566  if(!ec) {
567  std::istream stream(read_buffer.get());
568 
569  std::vector<unsigned char> length_bytes;
570  length_bytes.resize(8);
571  stream.read((char*)&length_bytes[0], 8);
572 
573  size_t length=0;
574  int num_bytes=8;
575  for(int c=0;c<num_bytes;c++)
576  length+=length_bytes[c]<<(8*(num_bytes-1-c));
577 
578  read_message_content(connection, read_buffer, length, endpoint, fin_rsv_opcode);
579  }
580  else
581  connection_error(connection, endpoint, ec);
582  });
583  }
584  else
585  read_message_content(connection, read_buffer, length, endpoint, fin_rsv_opcode);
586  }
587  else
588  connection_error(connection, endpoint, ec);
589  });
590  }
591 
592  void read_message_content(const std::shared_ptr<Connection> &connection, const std::shared_ptr<asio::streambuf> &read_buffer,
593  size_t length, Endpoint& endpoint, unsigned char fin_rsv_opcode) const {
594  asio::async_read(*connection->socket, *read_buffer, asio::transfer_exactly(4+length),
595  [this, connection, read_buffer, length, &endpoint, fin_rsv_opcode]
596  (const error_code& ec, size_t /*bytes_transferred*/) {
597  if(!ec) {
598  std::istream raw_message_data(read_buffer.get());
599 
600  //Read mask
601  std::vector<unsigned char> mask;
602  mask.resize(4);
603  raw_message_data.read((char*)&mask[0], 4);
604 
605  std::shared_ptr<Message> message(new Message());
606  message->length=length;
607  message->fin_rsv_opcode=fin_rsv_opcode;
608 
609  std::ostream message_data_out_stream(&message->streambuf);
610  for(size_t c=0;c<length;c++) {
611  message_data_out_stream.put(raw_message_data.get()^mask[c%4]);
612  }
613 
614  //If connection close
615  if((fin_rsv_opcode&0x0f)==8) {
616  int status=0;
617  if(length>=2) {
618  unsigned char byte1=message->get();
619  unsigned char byte2=message->get();
620  status=(byte1<<8)+byte2;
621  }
622 
623  auto reason=message->string();
624  send_close(connection, status, reason, [this, connection](const error_code& /*ec*/) {});
625  connection_close(connection, endpoint, status, reason);
626  return;
627  }
628  else {
629  //If ping
630  if((fin_rsv_opcode&0x0f)==9) {
631  //send pong
632  auto empty_send_stream=std::make_shared<SendStream>();
633  send(connection, empty_send_stream, nullptr, fin_rsv_opcode+1);
634  }
635  else if(endpoint.on_message) {
636  timer_idle_reset(connection);
637  endpoint.on_message(connection, message);
638  }
639 
640  //Next message
641  read_message(connection, read_buffer, endpoint);
642  }
643  }
644  else
645  connection_error(connection, endpoint, ec);
646  });
647  }
648 
649  void connection_open(const std::shared_ptr<Connection> &connection, Endpoint& endpoint) {
650  timer_idle_init(connection);
651 
652  {
653  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(endpoint.connections_mutex);
654  endpoint.connections.insert(connection);
655  }
656 
657  if(endpoint.on_open)
658  endpoint.on_open(connection);
659  }
660 
661  void connection_close(const std::shared_ptr<Connection> &connection, Endpoint& endpoint, int status, const std::string& reason) const {
662  timer_idle_cancel(connection);
663 
664  {
665  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(endpoint.connections_mutex);
666  endpoint.connections.erase(connection);
667  }
668 
669  if(endpoint.on_close)
670  endpoint.on_close(connection, status, reason);
671  }
672 
673  void connection_error(const std::shared_ptr<Connection> &connection, Endpoint& endpoint, const error_code& ec) const {
674  timer_idle_cancel(connection);
675 
676  {
677  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(endpoint.connections_mutex);
678  endpoint.connections.erase(connection);
679  }
680 
681  if(endpoint.on_error)
682  endpoint.on_error(connection, ec);
683  }
684 
685  void timer_idle_init(const std::shared_ptr<Connection> &connection) {
686  if(config.timeout_idle>0) {
687  connection->timer_idle=std::unique_ptr<asio::deadline_timer>(new asio::deadline_timer(connection->socket->get_io_service()));
688  connection->timer_idle->expires_from_now(boost::posix_time::seconds(static_cast<unsigned long>(config.timeout_idle)));
689  timer_idle_expired_function(connection);
690  }
691  }
692  void timer_idle_reset(const std::shared_ptr<Connection> &connection) const {
693  if(config.timeout_idle>0 && connection->timer_idle->expires_from_now(boost::posix_time::seconds(static_cast<unsigned long>(config.timeout_idle)))>0)
694  timer_idle_expired_function(connection);
695  }
696  void timer_idle_cancel(const std::shared_ptr<Connection> &connection) const {
697  if(config.timeout_idle>0)
698  connection->timer_idle->cancel();
699  }
700 
701  void timer_idle_expired_function(const std::shared_ptr<Connection> &connection) const {
702  connection->timer_idle->async_wait([this, connection](const error_code& ec){
703  if(!ec)
704  send_close(connection, 1000, "idle timeout"); //1000=normal closure
705  });
706  }
707  };
708 
709  template<class socket_type>
710  class SocketServer : public SocketServerBase<socket_type> {};
711 
712  typedef asio::ip::tcp::socket WS;
713 
714  template<>
715  class SocketServer<WS> : public SocketServerBase<WS> {
716  public:
717  DEPRECATED SocketServer(unsigned short port, size_t thread_pool_size=1, size_t timeout_request=5, size_t timeout_idle=0) :
718  SocketServer() {
719  config.port=port;
720  config.thread_pool_size=thread_pool_size;
721  config.timeout_request=timeout_request;
722  config.timeout_idle=timeout_idle;
723  };
724 
725  SocketServer() : SocketServerBase<WS>(80) {}
726 
727  protected:
728  void accept() {
729  //Create new socket for this connection (stored in Connection::socket)
730  //Shared_ptr is used to pass temporary objects to the asynchronous functions
731  std::shared_ptr<Connection> connection(new Connection(new WS(*io_service)));
732 
733  acceptor->async_accept(*connection->socket, [this, connection](const error_code& ec) {
734  //Immediately start accepting a new connection (if io_service hasn't been stopped)
735  if (ec != asio::error::operation_aborted)
736  accept();
737 
738  if(!ec) {
739  asio::ip::tcp::no_delay option(true);
740  connection->socket->set_option(option);
741 
742  read_handshake(connection);
743  }
744  });
745  }
746  };
747  // TODO: remove when onopen, onmessage, etc is removed:
748  #ifdef __GNUC__
749  #pragma GCC diagnostic pop
750  #elif defined(_MSC_VER)
751  #pragma warning(pop)
752  #endif
753 }
754 
755 #endif /* SERVER_WS_HPP */
